metadata.name: Infinite Mineral N°0000
metadata.description:
Infinite Mineral N°0000

The Seed Mineral;

Created as the opening piece for the Infinite Minerals collection, this artwork contains a unique Infinite Mineral in a state of constant evolution. Cycling between attributes before reaching its final form.

Owners of this open edition artwork will be granted early access to the full Infinite Minerals drop, coming soon.

10s MP4 Video, 1280x1280. Higher resolutions available upon request.
